effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.
